issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

fields.summary: Private network index allocation is not thread safe

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Using the Eutester StopStart testcase against VMware with 2 nodes direct to ESX, the start call fails with the following: [2012-12-11 17:39:33,113] [i-A5FB40C9-192.168.41.65] [DEBUG]: i-A5FB40C9 Attempting to start instance... [101mTraceback (most recent call last): File "/share/python_lib/stable/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eutester-0.0.5-py2.6.egg/eutester/eutestcase.py", line 262, in run ret = self.method() File "./test_script", line 37, in MyTest instance.start_instance_and_verify(timeout=480) File "/share/python_lib/stable/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eutester-0.0.5-py2.6.egg/eutester/euinstance.py", line 841, in start_instance_and_verify self.start() File "/share/python_lib/stable/lib/python2.6/site-packages/boto-2.5.2-py2.6.egg/boto/ec2/instance.py", line 325, in start rs = self.connection.start_instances([self.id]) File "/share/python_lib/stable/lib/python2.6/site-packages/boto-2.5.2-py2.6.egg/boto/ec2/connection.py", line 760, in start_instances [('item', Instance)], verb='POST') File "/share/python_lib/stable/lib/python2.6/site-packages/boto-2.5.2-py2.6.egg/boto/connection.py", line 980, in get_list raise self.ResponseError(response.status, response.reason, body) EC2ResponseError: EC2ResponseError: 406 Not Acceptable StartInstancesTypeError while committing the transactionjavax.persistence.RollbackException: Error while committing the transaction Caused by: javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not execute JDBC batch update Caused by: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not execute JDBC batch update Caused by: java.sql.BatchUpdateException: Batch entry 0 insert into metadata_network_indices (creation_timestamp, last_update_timestamp, metadata_perm_uuid, version, metadata_display_name, metadata_last_state, metadata_state, metadata_state_change_stack, metadata_account_name, metadata_account_id, metadata_unique_name, metadata_user_id, metadata_user_name, metadata_network_index_bogus_id, metadata_network_index_extant_network_fk, metadata_network_index, id) values ('2012-12-11 17:39:33.192000 -08:00:00', '2012-12-11 17:39:33.192000 -08:00:00', '676794e3-4635-4428-9225-6ef5f1e3ab1c', '0', '4:27', 'FREE', 'FREE', 'n/a', NULL, '132905821022', '132905821022:4:27', 'LJA8DRCTKKABZWCQ791ZY', 'admin', '4:27', '4028b3d03b8c299c013b8cc44cc301eb', '27', '4028b3d03b8c299c013b8cc44cc801ec') was aborted. Call getNextException to see the cause. javax.persistence.RollbackException: Error while committing the transaction at org.hibernate.ejb.TransactionImpl.commit(TransactionImpl.java:93) at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx$TxState.commit(Entities.java:846) at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx.commit(Entities.java:704) at fields.summary: With BFEBS stop/start being called very very close together, on start unique constraint violation

{code}

[~zhill], can you look at this bug and provide brief status?  

[~viglesias], this was opened as a blocker for 3.2.0, please confirm the priority.
This ticket relates to VMware. See https://www.eucalyptus.com/eucalyptus-cloud/iaas/compatibility for latest hypervisor compatibility by version.
